description:
A clock and alarm clock in Star Trek style with cool Star Trek sounds and animations. You can set 2 different alarms for different days (weekday, daily, weekend).
Tap the black background for snooze mode.
Works in Exhibition mode!!

This app will be free but you can make a donation on my website or buy another one of my apps if you want to support me.

STAR TREK and related marks are trademarks of CBS. No infringement is intended. CBS does not endorse, sponsor, and is not affiliated with this application.
versionNote:
* fix for animation
* stardate
* text-to-speech functionality tells you the current time
